scripts.beautify-for-test: node scripts/beautify-proj/index.js -i test -o beautified/beautified -c beautify.json && node scripts/beautify-proj/index.js -i scripts -o beautified/beautified -c beautify.json
scripts.assert-beautified: npm run beautify-for-test && npm run copy-to-beautified && npm run beautified
scripts.beautify: node scripts/beautify-proj/index.js -i test -o . -c beautify.json && node scripts/beautify-proj/index.js -i scripts -o . -c beautify.json
scripts.test: npm run jshint && npm run test-node
scripts.test-firefox: npm run jshint && CLIENT=selenium:firefox npm run test-browser
scripts.test-chrome: npm run jshint && CLIENT=selenium:chrome npm run test-browser
scripts.test-phantomjs: npm run jshint && CLIENT=selenium:phantomjs npm run test-browser
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && browserify index.js -s DeltaDB -o dist/deltadb.js && npm run min
scripts.dev: browserify test/test.js > test/test-bundle.js && npm run dev-server
scripts.coverage: mkdir -p coverage/node && npm test --coverage && istanbul check-coverage --lines 100 --function 100 --statements 100 --branches 100 coverage/node/coverage.json
scripts.new-test-phantomjs: npm run jshint && npm run build-test-coverage && npm run new-test-browser && npm run coverage-report && npm run check-coverage
scripts.tmp1: npm run jshint && npm run build-test-coverage
scripts.tmp2: npm run jshint && npm run build-test-coverage && npm run new-test-browser
